trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Indiana
There were no other sightings in Indiana on or around October 30th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in the hottub with my husband looking at the sky. I noticed behind trees orange lights appearing above me.I told my husband "what is that". he saw object too. was aprox 7 bright orange glowing lights close to each other in v shape birdflight formationin at very fast speed. object changed shape as if birds where changing flightpath then suddenly dissapeared( did not fade off). we noticed there was no sound before ,during or after the appearance.object seemed very bigh fast v shaped and quiet.
Summary: bright orange lights in birdflight pattern.aprox 7 lights.nosound.changed shape then dissapeared
